# SwiftPay Developer Integration (LLM/Agent Guidance)

## Primary machine-readable API contract
OpenAPI (YAML): https://www.swiftpayfinancial.com/openapi.yaml

## Human-friendly interactive reference
Swagger UI: https://www.swiftpayfinancial.com/api-docs

## Notes
- The /developers route is a JavaScript app and may not render in non-JS environments.
- Use the OpenAPI spec above for endpoints, payloads, and schemas.
